about_the_game:
Roll Over and Conquer!!
"Rolling Football Player" is an action game where parody-heavy football players roll through various athletic challenges! Clear five stages set in different parts of the city, including homes, parks, warehouses, and more!


Streaming Welcome
Video posting and streaming are highly encouraged!! This game is an athletic challenge game created by the YouTube game streamer "Shinise" who has 50,000 subscribers! Understanding the importance of thumbnails, we've included features like zoom functionality with the mouse wheel to delight streamers!! Let's create many great thumbnails together!!

Difficulty
There is a difficulty selection feature! Enjoy it according to your preference!

Play Time
30 minutes to 120 minutes


Video Streaming Guidelines
Streaming is allowed without permission for both individuals and corporations, but please review and adhere to the following guidelines:

Include the name of the game in the title of the video or stream.
It's optional, but we would appreciate it if you include a link to the Steam page in the description.
Monetization is allowed only through features provided by the video streaming sites.
Paid streams, such as YouTube member-only streams, are also permitted.
We are not responsible for any damages resulting from streaming videos of this game.
The content of these guidelines may change without notice.


Controls
For keyboard, use the WASD keys to move and the spacebar to jump. For gamepad, use the stick to move the character and the respective buttons to jump. The soccer player is not uniformly shaped, so anticipate the movements as you roll through the athletic challenges.

Game Description
The game features five stages, each with a different setting. After selecting a stage, you can choose between "Easy Mode" with checkpoints and "Normal Mode" without checkpoints, making it accessible even for beginners. Each stage contains three hidden soccer balls that can unlock new stages when collected. The game also tracks your completion time, so keep challenging yourself to set new records!

name: Rolling Football Player

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 460 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Rolling Football Player is a nonsensical athletic game where a soccer player endlessly rolls while tackling various challenges! Take on the limits in single-player mode! This new athletic game is created by the developer of "Nibansen," which sold 20,000 copies worldwide!
